meta.description: Maximize the total profit from producing fruit salads A and B given resource constraints.

sets.name: FRUITS
sets.description: Types of fruits used in salads

params.name: profit
params.description: Net profit per unit of each salad type

params.name: resource_usage
params.description: Amount of each fruit used per unit of each salad type

vars.name: x
vars.description: Number of units produced for each type of salad

objective.name: max_total_profit
objective.description: Maximize the total profit from producing salads A and B

constraints.name: mango_usage
constraints.description: Mango usage constraint with at most 5 additional units used

constraints.name: pineapple_usage
constraints.description: Pineapple usage constraint with at most 5 additional units used

constraints.name: strawberry_usage
constraints.description: Strawberry usage constraint with at most 5 additional units used
